description: Describes the optional user information which is being derived from a bearer token of a request.

displayName.description: The display name of the user. This will be by default derived from the common name claims of a token like name, displayName, or familyName and firstName.
displayName.title: displayName

name.description: The user name. This will be by default derived from the common user name claims of a token like email, emailAddress or upn.
name.title: name

tokenValidated.description: This will be true if the apex was able to validate the token in the request.
tokenValidated.title: tokenValidated

title: UserInfo
